product_name: Benefit CosmeticsAll-in-One Mask Wand Mask Applicator & Cleansing Tool
summary: SummaryThis silicone wand easily applies & removes masks AND helps cleanse, massage & exfoliate. Pair with any mask from The POREfessional Pore Care family for controlled application and removal, or with The POREfessional Good Cleanup foaming cleanser to massage & gently exfoliate during cleansing.
details: DetailsFeaturesDouble-ended for versatilitySpatula side applies masks evenlyBristle side removes masks, exfoliates and massagesItem 2606916How To UseTIPS & TRICKS: Use the spatula side to apply & spread product evenly. With gentle, circular motions, use the bristle side to remove product or to massage & exfoliate while cleansing.Beauty Tip: Rinse with warm water and soap to clean.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: TIPS & TRICKS: Use the spatula side to apply & spread product evenly. With gentle, circular motions, use the bristle side to remove product or to massage & exfoliate while cleansing.Beauty Tip: Rinse with warm water and soap to clean.

reviews.headline: Not what I hoped for
reviews.comments:
This brush is high quality and clearly built to last. That said, instructions were vague-only described use for one side of the brush. And I wasted a good deal of product trying to use as a mask applicator. 
Returned after one use.

reviews.headline: I would recommend this product.
reviews.comments: For the price, it works wonderful. First use, my face looked brighter and felt cleaner.

reviews.headline: Excellent product!
reviews.comments: I am very picky when it comes to getting prducts or tools for my face beacause i have sensible skin but this has been a came changer, leaves my skin soft and radiant when using it to cleanse my face.

reviews.headline: Wanted to love it too
reviews.comments: It's not what I expected. I expected for it to be flexible. Have to go over my face with my hands to get in the crevices. That defeats the purpose. Works great for mask applications and removal, but not for everyday cleansing.

reviews.headline: Game changer!
reviews.comments: This is and has completely changed the appearance and the overall health of my skin in just a few weeks. I use it every time I wash my face and it keeps my skin feeling smooth and healthy now!

reviews.headline: New favorite tool
reviews.comments: Love this tool to put on masks

reviews.headline: an all in one tool
reviews.comments: I love this. it applies masks and I love using the pore cleanser with this. It gets the oils off my face with the gentle scrub side

reviews.headline: Worth it
reviews.comments:
I put off buying this wand because I thought of it as a "want" instead of a "need." I'm glad I finally caved.

I normally put face masks on with a flat foundation brush or my fingers. I found that I've used less product with this. The masks are easier to spread, and since nothing actually sticks to the wand, it's so easy to clean off what little mask is left.

I alternate between face cloths and an Foreo device, but I sometimes forget to put the Foreo back in the shower (first world problems, I know). Now I keep that in the shower, and I can keep this at my sink. I feel like my face is just ask clean when I use this wand. 

I think it's a good investment for the price. Two in one. Worth it.
